alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 1:12PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of east central Lincoln and central Flathead Counties through 200 PM MST... At 111 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported an intense snow shower over Columbia Falls and Hungry Horse, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Whitefish, Columbia Falls, Martin City, Coram, Lupfer, Pinnacle, Essex, Hungry Horse, La Salle and Nyack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
